channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1521296839303380992
item.description: New LiDAR covering New Plymouth. Thanks @TaranakiRC for the first LiDAR in this region! DEM/DSM at https://t.co/lC9dJYOw12. Point clouds @OpenTopography. Image: Hillshade of the DSM showing Port Taranaki and New Plymouth #opendata https://t.co/gcbpBPpoDd

item.title: #es @ 1521289986066329600
#es @ 1521231305786241089
item.description:
En el Perú llevamos 14 semanas consecutivas de descenso de casos #COVID19 con una reducción del 99.5% desde el pico máximo (última semana de enero/2022).
Todas las regiones por debajo del 5% en positividad y sin punto de quiebre al alza.
Fuente: #DatosAbiertos https://t.co/EKUeXkReJN

item.title: #fr @ 1521223013785649153
item.description: Des images de VLCC d'huile de friture ( hum hum 🤥) pour nourrir un raffinerie définie comme un monstre qui est une boîte noire...On pouvait se passer de ça et bosser le sujet sur des données publiques. Ça aurait donné des trucs plus marquants en plus.

item.title: #it @ 1520746037626998790
item.description:
Senza dimenticare che nonostante riceva milioni di euro ogni anno benché sia un grande promotore del libero mercato, lo comprano meno lettori del giornalino parrocchiale.
Gli ultimi dati pubblici di anni fa segnavano meno di 25.000 lettori paganti (meno del Giornale di Brescia).

item.description: @MartinZ_uncut CHIFFRE MORTS COVID DE 03/2020 A 04/2022 - 31 439 décès - 91,83% ont plus de 65 ans - 16 morts entre 0-24 ans - 193 morts entre 24 - 44 ans (Source open data Sciensano) Les décès sont des personnes à espérance de vie basse. Vacciner les - de 65 ans n'a aucun bénéfice. https://t.co/qdcZoBudZH

item.title: #es @ 1520532551877775360
item.description:
En el Perú: ha pasado UN mes del 1er lote recibido de #VacunaCOVID19 de Moderna y tras haber distribuido 1.7 millones, sólo el 10% se ha aplicado.
Vía #DatosAbiertos y CENARES
⚠️Esperemos que NO pase lo mismo que las vacunas pediátricas de Pfizer y caduquen por falta de gestión https://t.co/24IFnRxaoz

item.title: #en @ 1520454183010320384
item.description: Our idea: People know their dogs ... and REALLY like to talk about them. Let's ask them at https://t.co/rNfTBSQW6D! All dogs welcome: purebred, mixed breed, mystery dogs. From anywhere in world. Result? DATAPALOOZA! @designerguy #OpenData #CitizenScience #citizensciencemonth 5/n https://t.co/jSfW1NhY3R

NOS experts télés avaient accès à ces data. Pourquoi ont-ils foiré?

item.title: #en @ 1520278814936469505
item.description: On 6th April, @AgriThamani conducted an #openmap training to #youth students at the Zoom Institute of Technology in Bukoba, Kagera. item.title: #es @ 1520161232048721920
item.description: Este gobierno es trágico en innumerables sentidos, pero una de las áreas en la que mas se nota es en la de datos abiertos. Increíble como destruyeron todo lo que hizo el gobierno de Cambiemos en cuanto a datos https://t.co/UPVeaTXuSn

item.title: #fr @ 1520152519833530371
#it @ 1520149341532475392
item.description: @Adnkronos Siete in malafede. I dati che pubblicate sono in assoluta controtendenza con quelli degli altri Stati. Invece di secretare, rendete i dati pubblici e facilmente ricostruibili. Noi non vi crediamo piú!

item.title: #en @ 1520142272813101056
item.description:
Calling all trash lovers out there, please help us spread the word. We created a portal where you can upload photos and retrieve a computer vision output about what trash is in the photos. #OpenSource #PlasticPollution
https://t.co/XlNM8YHxmq

item.title: #en @ 1520089182751895553
item.description:
3/ Cities/States Data Portals
Looking for info about specific cities, here are some.
NewYork - https://t.co/IjbsPmJvcw
Texas - https://t.co/YFdhZGdCSu
Toronto - https://t.co/POyDziWyk8
You can google your city/ state of choice & add the keywords “data portal” https://t.co/osFPnAx0QN

item.title: #en @ 1520089176967897088
item.description:
1/ World Bank Open Data portal
World bank has a data catalog to help you search through their datasets using keywords. Find things around population, economic development, energy data and much more.
https://t.co/x2kYEtsOzt https://t.co/DHinYaBnOs https://t.co/sLVzK0pJei

item.description: Finally growing up! I am now starting to use project management software to organize all my projects and deliverables.

item.title: #en @ 1520086643117633537
item.description: A few #openbelgium22 attendees joined our #opendatabikeride. The weather cleared up nicely and we had a blast, passing by and sometimes through some iconic open data locations. With @coghent as the halfway point and headliner. https://t.co/5uEUGcaeV5

item.title: #en @ 1520086587291361280
item.description: @olsonista My favorite would be the various ways people conceive of "de identified" and "anonymous" data, especially in combination with calls for open data, what participants thing will happen to their data, and the perspective of data *risk* rather than safe/unsafe, okay/not okay to share

item.title: #es @ 1520085754470297600
item.description: ¿Sabías que la @SESNAOficial y @UKinMexico 🤝 trabajan en un nuevo servicio: #ValidAPI, el cual facilitará la conexión de las instituciones públicas con la Plataforma Digital Nacional? 🧑‍💻. ¡En breve conoce más! #UKAgainstCorruption #InteligenciaAnticorrupción #OpenData #opengov https://t.co/Ei31ZwW9UN

item.title: #en @ 1520082376231034880
item.description:
Smart Cities Open Data Initiative was born to facilitate single window access to databanks & blogs published in an open format by the Smart Cities, currently, it houses over 5000 datasets & 85 blogs.
#ICCC #InitiateInnovateInspire #missiontomovement #SmartCitiesMission https://t.co/f4j77CuxYe

item.title: #fi @ 1520077582124949504
item.description: @TomiV_Leivo @THLorg @STM_Uutiset @Laakariliitto @AuniMarja @helsinki Usea lääkäri on kertonut minulle anonyymisti että liitto on ottanut yhteyttä & pyytänyt hiljenemään. Olen pahoillani: keskustelun & julkisen kritiikin estävä kollegiaalisuusohjeenne on aataminaikuinen modernissa yhteiskunnassa jossa vallitsee globaali🌍🌏🌎 #OpenData #OpenScience

item.title: #fr @ 1520067168540495872

item.title: #en @ 1520061429726031872
item.description:
This Wednesday (04/05)🗓️, Professor @Ocorcho presents a new study on the future role of @EU_opendata as a repository for public data sources. What can be its added value in relation to other data infrastructures?
Register and join our webinar to find out! https://t.co/PUAhqwA6if https://t.co/oJ1FU5zSHW

item.title: #fr @ 1520054442216890368
item.description:
Bruit à Paris :
Encore un remarquable travail d'open data par @Terrasses_75.
Où l'on voit par exemple que dans le 18e à peine 10 amendes auraient été infligées en un an aux bars, commerces ou chantiers ne respectant pas les règles... 🥳
#saccageparis #saccagelesommeil https://t.co/vf4cnRAUao

item.title: #fr @ 1520036477580763136
item.description:

✔️ Pour y accéder => https://t.co/7P7Lf6e1pZ

item.title: #en @ 1520035004381814786
item.description: Really excited to have Professor @HughShanahan give a seminar on Open Data at the @ismb_london Computational Biology incubator meeting this afternoon. Open science matters. In fact, it's the only science that matters.

item.title: #fr @ 1520032314205650944
item.description: [Open data] Toutes les décisions civiles, sociales & commerciales rendues publiquement par les 36 cours d’appel de France postérieurement au 15.04.22 sont désormais disponibles via Judilibre, le moteur de recherche du site internet de la Cour de cassation >https://t.co/hn7GN93VGH https://t.co/9Z2T5txThQ

item.title: #de @ 1520031116262051840
item.description: Mit @Make_org entsteht in Frankreich eine spannende #CivicTech-Plattform um das Team von Alicia Combaz. Herzlichen Dank für das Gespräch heute über #OpenData in Städten und demokratiekonforme Dateninnovationen. @Make_orgDE https://t.co/XzWHfj8knt
